attributes.action: nominate gary numan for an mbe for his contribution to music
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gary Numan has influenced not just A generation but several and all over the world, his music both inspired and been a part of popular culture for nearly 30 years, and yet at this point he has recieved no recognition of this by anyone other than his loyal fans, he has continued to produce music throughout this time even though enduring personal trauma, attacks on both his character and that of his family, this is not someone who had massive success that has been sustained for all of his carear, he has battled highs and lows and still many of todays mainstream artists site him as an influential character in their carears.

for his fortitude and constant striving for perfection in his chosen carear i believe he should be nominated and recieve an MBE
